ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure youre understanding...(and maybe I don t either)...I don t think your Skills go DOWN....but there is a seperate set of skill levels listed in
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not sure youre understanding...(and maybe I don't either)...I
don't think your Skills go DOWN....but there is a seperate set of skill
levels listed in Specialization???




From: Tim Borelli <timb@...> on 06/10/99 08:13 AM PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] specialization

From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>

well, considering all my discliplines except conjuration are around
110,
i'll miss that =P. and trust me, when you hit lvl 20, you want your
conjuraion to be higher than 50, you fiz a LOT if it's low when
trying to
cast the lvl 20 pet... at least, i do =)

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 21st lvl enchanter on
Cazic-Thule

>They can't go any higher than 50 I think. Its not exactly like
your
>crippled though.
>Having a 50 in other areas I would hope will definatly help you.
>
>Its just that you can't be a master of many disciplines, just one.
>
>Azboklin
